Package atentoYRapido

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
atentoYRapido.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
The Class GameManager. This class manages the game logic. It manages the game status, level, life, can check the game status update the squares design, set a new level and reset the game.
